00025 
00026 #ifndef RFEVENT_H
00027 #define RFEVENT_H
00028 
00029 #ifdef HAVE_CONFIG_H
00030 #include "config.h"
00031 #endif
00032 
00033 #include <ext_algorithm.hpp>
00034 #include "eventspace.hpp"
00035 
00036 namespace maxent {
00037 using namespace std;
00038 
00039 namespace rf {
00040     // RandomField Event
00041 struct Event {
00042     public:
00043     typedef size_t feat_id_type;
00044     typedef size_t outcome_id_type;
00045     // to save memory, feature value is defined as float rather than double
00046     // a context is a set of <feature, fvalue> pair
00047     typedef pair<feat_id_type, float> context_type;
00048 
00049     Event():m_context(0), m_context_size(0), m_count(0), m_prior(1.0) {}
00050 
00051     Event(context_type* context, size_t context_size, size_t count):
00052         m_context(context), m_context_size(context_size),
00053     m_count(count), m_prior(1.0){}
00054 
00055     context_type*   m_context;
00056     size_t       m_context_size;
00057     size_t       m_count;
00058     double       m_prior;    // store prior(x), if the prior is uniform 
00059                              // then the model becomes Maxent Model
00060 
00061     size_t context_size() const { return m_context_size; }
00062 
00063     //compare features (including fvalues)
00064     bool operator<(const Event& rhs) const {
00065         int ret = lexicographical_compare_3way(m_context,
00066                 m_context + m_context_size,
00067                 rhs.m_context, rhs.m_context + rhs.m_context_size);
00068         return ret < 0;
00069     }
00070 
00071     bool operator>(const Event& rhs) const {
00072         return rhs < *this;
00073     }
00074 
00075     // two events are equal if they have the same features
00076     bool operator==(const Event& rhs) const {
00077         bool eq = is_same_context(rhs);
00078         if (eq) assert(m_prior == rhs.m_prior);
00079         return eq;
00080     }
00081 
00082     bool is_same_context(const Event& rhs) const {
00083             return (lexicographical_compare_3way(m_context,
00084                 m_context + m_context_size,
00085                 rhs.m_context, rhs.m_context + rhs.m_context_size) == 0);
00086     }
00087 
00088     void set_outcome(outcome_id_type oid) {}
00089 
00090     void set_prior(const double p) {m_prior = p;}
00091 };
00092 
00093 typedef EventSpace<rf::Event> RFEventSpace;
00094 typedef RFEventSpace::featmap_type featmap_type;
00095 typedef std::string feature_type;
00096 
00097 } // namespace rf
00098 } // namespace maxent
00099 
00100 #endif /* ifndef RFEVENT_H */
